trans-unit.source: Reserves a location on a Web page in which to display localized static text.
trans-unit.target: 保留網頁上要顯示當地語系化靜態文字的位置。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [簡介](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize> control to reserve a location on a Web page in which to display localized text.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize>控制来保留在網頁上要顯示當地語系化的文字的位置。

trans-unit.source: Controls that are outside the `body` element are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 以外的控制項`body`項目會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize> control inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control and is identical to it in every way.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize>控制項繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控制和等同於它在每種用途。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize> control is used at design time to distinguish static text that can be localized from other static text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize>控制項在設計階段用來區別其他靜態文字的靜態文字，您可以當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control allows you to apply a style to the displayed text, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize> control does not.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項可讓您將樣式套用至顯示的文字，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize>控制項並不會。

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically manage the text displayed in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過程式設計方式管理設定控制項中顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize> control to display static text.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize>控制項顯示靜態文字。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Localize>類別。
